typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CloudSalesCustomers
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID2 as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CloudSalesAddresses
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CloudStreamingCustomers
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CloudStreamingAddresses
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FourthCoffeeCustomersAndAddresses
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> VanArsdelLtdCustomersAndAddresses
derivedColumn2, derivedColumn4 join(CustomerID == CustomerID2,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> join1
CloudSalesCustomers derive(SourceID = 1) ~> derivedColumn1
derivedColumn1 derive(UniqueID = concat(toString(SourceID), CustomerID)) ~> derivedColumn2
CloudSalesAddresses derive(SourceID = 1) ~> derivedColumn3
derivedColumn3 derive(UniqueID = concat(toString(SourceID), CustomerID2, AddressID)) ~> derivedColumn4
CloudStreamingCustomers derive(SourceID = 1) ~> derivedColumn5
CloudStreamingAddresses derive(SourceID = 1) ~> derivedColumn6
VanArsdelLtdCustomersAndAddresses derive(SourceID = 2) ~> derivedColumn7
FourthCoffeeCustomersAndAddresses derive(SourceID = 3,
		CreatedDate = toTimestamp(CreatedDate),
		UpdatedDate = toTimestamp(UpdatedDate)) ~> derivedColumn8
derivedColumn5 derive(UniqueID = concat(toString(SourceID), CustomerID)) ~> derivedColumn9
derivedColumn6 derive(UniqueID = concat(toString(SourceID),CustomerID,AddressID)) ~> derivedColumn10
derivedColumn9, derivedColumn10 join(CloudStreamingCustomers@CustomerID == CloudStreamingAddresses@CustomerID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> join2
derivedColumn8 derive(UniqueID = concat(toString(SourceID), CustomerID)) ~> derivedColumn11
derivedColumn7 derive(UniqueID = concat(toString(SourceID),CustomerID)) ~> derivedColumn12
join1 select(mapColumn(
		SourceID = derivedColumn1@SourceID,
		CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		CreatedDate = CloudSalesCustomers@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate = CloudSalesCustomers@UpdatedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select1
join2 select(mapColumn(
		SourceID = derivedColumn5@SourceID,
		CustomerID = CloudStreamingCustomers@CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		CreatedDate = CloudStreamingCustomers@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate = CloudStreamingCustomers@UpdatedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select2
derivedColumn11 select(mapColumn(
		SourceID,
		CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select3
derivedColumn12 select(mapColumn(
		SourceID,
		CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select4
select4, select1, select2, select3 union(byName: true)~> union2
union2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string
	),
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
